title: Gross on Paper is here!
itunes:title: Gross on Paper is here!
description:
It’s finally here - the Grossy Pelosi / Bad on Paper crossover episode (AKA Gross on Paper). Dan Pelosi is the creator behind the Instagram account @grossypelosi and website, danpelosi.com. Today, he joins us to talk all things food! Dan shares his cooking origin story: from a childhood spent in his grandparents kitchen to having his own platform. He runs down a list of meals for when you are trying to impress or just decompress, gives grocery shopping tips, and chats ways to repurpose leftovers. And — of course — a few Bimpy stories along the way!

 

More Dan:

  • @grossypelosi
  • danpelosi.com
  • Grossery List (for offer codes)
  • donate to Sage
  • donate to Okra Project
  • Purchase Merch on Website

 

 

Cookbooks:

  • Where Cooking Begins by Carla Lalli
  • Barefoot Contessa Cookbooks
  • River Cafe Cookbook - 30th Anniversary Edition

Obsessions:

  • VOTE Tees:
    • SW Designs
    • Jess Keys / Alice & Wonder
    • Camilyn Beth
  • Partners Coffee: Brooklyn Roast
  • Show: Episodes (on Netflix)

Instagram:

  • @punkpostco
  • @michellearmas007
  • @karlareed

We’re Reading:

  • Heart Bones by Colleen Hoover
  • The Mall by Megan McCafferty
  • Destination Wedding by Dicta Bosu
  • Kings County by David Goodwillie

September Book Club:

  • Majesty (American Royals Book 2) by Katharine McGee

Sponsor:

  • Bombas: So give a pair of socks when you buy a pair and get 20% off your first purchase bombas.com/BOP
  • Prose: Go to prose.com/BOP for your free in-depth hair quiz and 15% off your order.

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more!

Like and subscribe to RomComPods. Available wherever you listen to podcasts. Visit Grace’s blog, The Stripe. New posts daily!

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast. Follow Grace on Instagram @graceatwood and Becca @beccamfreeman.
